title: Blue Gold Marble Hand Towel Abstract Fingertip Face Towels Cotton Soft Absorbent Luxury Kitchen Dish Cloth Washcloths 30 x 15 Inch for Bathroom Guest Gym Hotel Spa Yoga Sport Home Decor
features: 【High Quality Towels】These hand towels are made from high-quality soft polyester microfiber and cotton which allow them to have an extra soft feel and super absorbent. These hand towels are fluffy, soft, skin-friendly and durable. The soft touch of these towels allows you to feel spa grandeur in the comfort of your own home.

【Durable Hand Towel】Hand towels are 30x15 inch generously size. Finished edges to prevent unraveling, luxury, lightweight and highly absorbent. The soft and fluffy material hand towel may be used for decoration or to quickly dry hands. Ideal for daily use, as a face towel, sweatband, baby towel, sports towels, spa towels, beach towel, hair towel or kitchen towels.

【Lightweight and Absorbent】Hand towels made of high quality microfiber, lightweight and softer than ordinary towel. Fingertip towels are designed to absorb more liquid than ordinary towels, and they dry quickly and completely. Durable and quick-drying hand towels. Also, very convenient to travel and carry

【Variety Of Uses】Hand towels are ideal for multipurpose, use as the premium quality makes it useable in daily routine. Its soft, super absorbent, nature is ideal for every age and everyday usage in your everyday lives. You can use as your bath towel for bathroom, salon towels, kitchen dishcloth or washcloths.

【Easy to Care】The hand towels are durable, machine washable, easy to care and clean. Recommended washing before use. These hand towels become softer with each wash and cause no shrank, tore up, or came out a different shape after several washes. (Note: Do not use bleach)
